title: AHS 8 September News Breakdown
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: This might be the best season yet .
I’m interested to see how AHS will combine Murder House and Coven
This will be the best season ever.

I have a theory. Since it’s said there’ll be a great turn/plot twist in the middle of the season, and with the kid blowing candles but eventually making the world into an post apocalyptic scene. Maybe that turn is Michael’s birthday, and his power will surge and such
So excited!!! This has been a long ass time coming and it's surreal that it's actually here! 👏🙌
